entries.text: #0Talk-1st time, while the protagonist is human
P-please, just stay away.
No, please, don't come near me. Nothing good will come of it.
#0Talk-2nd time, while the protagonist is human
Just leave me alone, please.
Leave this place, and leave me be, as I'd not see any harm befall you.
#0Talk-3rd time, while the protagonist is human
Please, just leave me alone.
#0Talk-1st time, while the protagonist is hollow
Well, you're nicely hollowed, aren't you...
Are you tormented by memories? Burdened by guilt?
Now the question. Are you ready for more? If you are, then we ought to talk...
#0Talk-2nd time, while the protagonist is hollow
This? This contains my power.
Long ago...this...naïve vessel of mine set about devising new spells.
The fool dreamt of bringing new forms of magic into the world.
But instead, he created me. Mostly by chance, but he did a fine job, I must say.
What he sought was strength. And so, I decided to demonstrate.
While my vessel slept, I'd find my mark, and hunt him down.
But my vessel did not approve. And so while I slept, he sealed the both of us away.
#0Talk-3rd time, while the protagonist is hollow
Now, I don't have anything against humans, but how is it that you go about defining good and evil?
I'm only using what the Gods gave me. How can that be so wrong?
So, what say you to a spot of murder on my behalf?
If you don't, I'll leave this place, and take more lives. Many more.
I couldn't give a fig either way. So, what's your choice?
#0Choose "No" to the 1st query
Yes, yes, of course. Forget that I asked.
That's what "good people" do, am I right?
Your feeble mind can't begin to comprehend me. Not that you've ever tried! Heh heh...
#0Choose "Yes" to the 1st query
Yes, I see, how very kind of you.
I want you to kill a merchant named Gilligan. A greedy, foul man. He won't be missed, I assure you.
Hmm...yes... Bring me a Ladder Miniature as proof.
He's the only person who'd have such an odd knick-knack... Heh heh...
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 1st query
I want you to kill a merchant named Gilligan.
And don't forget that Ladder Miniature. Heh heh...
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 1st query after acquiring Ladder Miniature
Heh heh heh... Fine work.
This is my thanks. Take it.
Now, let's discuss our next mark.
#0Talk-After giving Ladder Miniature
I want you to kill one more.
Your target will be Cale, the man who's drafting that map.
While I was trapped in here, he touched me, that maniac, like I was some rare specimen.
He wore a strange helm. Bring it back as proof.
#0Choose "Yes" to the 2nd query
Yes, I knew I could count on you.
Perhaps this will slake my thirst.
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 2nd query
I want you to kill Cale, the cartographer.
Bring his helm as proof.
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 2nd query after acquiring Cale's Helm
Heh heh heh... Fine work.
This is my thanks. Take it.
Now, let's discuss our next mark.
#0Talk-After giving Cale's Helm
I want you to kill one more.
You target is Felkin, the hexer.
As proof, bring me that peculiar sceptre of his.
What do you say?
#0Choose "Yes" to the 3rd query
Yes, very good.
But he will be formidable. Be cautious.
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 3rd query
I want you to kill Felkin. That's Felkin, the hexer.
He has that sceptre. Bring it to me as proof.
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 3rd query after acquiring the Sunset Stuff
Heh heh heh... Fine work.
This is my thanks. Take it.
Now, let's discuss something of importance.
#0Talk-After giving the Sunset Stuff
You could kill a dozen like that, and it wouldn't matter. I want you to kill someone of import.
I want you to kill the girl in Majula known as the Muse.
They say that she is the last Fire Keeper. But they say a lot of things...
That she's a gentle shepherd, lighting the way for you cursed fools. Nonsense.
Once she is dead, I will have no regrets, and I will be content to remain here.
The girl will have a peculiar feather. Bring it to me.
Now, go along. Heh heh...
#0Choose "No" to the 4th query
Having second thoughts?
It's your choice.
Ah hah hah, now you're getting nervous, hmm?
#0Choose "Yes" to the 4th query
Your mark is the girl in Majula known as the muse.
And don't forget that feather. Heh heh heh...
#0Talk-After choosing "Yes" to the 4th query after acquiring the Aged Feather
Yes, that's the feather.
Good, oh that is very good!
Your reward, take it. Heh heh heh...
#0Talk-After fulfilling all queries
What do you require?
You've been good to me. Go on, tell me what you need.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time, after fulfilling all queries
These are for you.
Don't mind the specks of blood... Heh heh heh ...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time, after fulfilling all queries
Now I am at peace.
I will sit here, and watch the world turn. Heh heh...
#0Talk-While the protagonist is human, after previously talked when hollowed
I haven't said anything strange, have I?
I have absolutely no intention of leaving here.
Do not attempt to help me. Just let me sit here, and wither quietly away...
#0Talk-1st time, after pulling the lever, while the protagonist is human
By the very gods... What have you done...
You've really done it... You'll never escape him...
#0Talk-1st time, after pulling the lever, while the protagonist is hollow
Hmgh...
I hope you appreciate the ramifications.
Well, no matter. What's done is done.
Besides, I've found myself a new mark... Gah hah hah...
#0Talk-2nd time, after pulling the lever, while the protagonist is hollow
I'll spend some time travelling the lands...
Slowly tracking my new mark...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing something
Well, as you wish. Heh heh...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing something
Find what you wanted? Hah hah hah hah...
#0After leaving abruptly
Oh, no?
#0Upon being attacked-1st time, while the protagonist is human
Please, stop that!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time, while the protagonist is human
What are you doing?!
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time, while the protagonist is human
Eeg!
#0Upon being attacked-1st time, while the protagonist is hollow
Hmm...
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time, while the protagonist is hollow
Yes, I see.
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time, while the protagonist is hollow
Do you jest?
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
You are most intriguing. Heh heh...
#0Upon approaching him, after he has previously killed the protagonist
Let's get right to it, shall we?
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Hmm, ooh... Hah hah hah hah! Not bad at all.
#0After reducing his health to 50% or lower
Heh heh heh, ah hah hah hah!
#0Upon dying
Death...aargh...could be worse...
##Undead, eh? Well, you've come a long way.
##As proof, bring me a hex of his creation.
##Bring me a hex of his creation as proof.
##I want you to kill the strange girl in Majula.
##Your mark is that strange girl in Majula.
##Heh heh heh heh heh...
